content: That's a great list of food and snack ideas! My mom will definitely appreciate the help with cooking. By the way, speaking of my mom, she's been really excited about my sister's engagement and has already started making wedding plans. She's been going over ideas with my sister and her fiancé, and they're thinking of having a summer wedding. Do you have any advice on planning a summer wedding, or any tips on how to make it more fun and memorable?
